title:
This is a Sunset Beach question...

There is a small cemetary at the end of Live Oak Drive at Seaside Road in Sunset Beach (directly behind Walgreen\'s). Who, or what family, is buried here and how old is this cemetary? Any information would be appreciated. No one I\'ve asked locally seems to know this information.
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.
